overview: Seamin Tak Seiman tells the story of a couple, Nuel (Petrus Mahendra) and Danisa (Dinda Kirana), who have different religions and try to fight for their relationship.  However, after undergoing this relationship, it actually hurt each other's feelings because neither of them gave in to changing religions.  In the end, the two of them decided to part ways on good terms.
title: Seamin Tak Seiman (Short Movie)
